resources.string: You will be given a nxn (n is between [3,7]) matrix as challenge. You memorize the numbers in the matrix as fast as possible then you click the "Got it" button, and try to restore the matrix. In same level, only if you finish kxk matrix 3 times, you can get (k+1)x(k+1) matrix challenge.
In Practice mode you can set all challenge options.
Numbers in matrix will be always sequence number from 1 to nxn. Candidates would be suggested when you restore the matrix.
Numbers in matrix will be random number from 1 to 99. Candidates would be suggested when you restore the matrix.
Numbers in matrix will be random number from 1 to 99. When you restore the matrix, you have to fill the matrix on your own, without suggestion.
Numbers in matrix will be random number from 1 to 999. When you restore the matrix, you have to fill the matrix on your own, without suggestion.
